channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The fixed bike frame to and chain on the pavement between the SPA Convenience Store & Tesco Express is in a state of disrepair and needs removing as this is sticking out, 19th August
item.description:
The fixed bike frame to and chain on the pavement between the SPA Convenience Store & Tesco Express in Blackfen Rd is in a state of disrepair and needs removing as this is sticking out
